Overall, the technical analysis indicates a cautious approach, as the stock price may continue to face downward pressure in the short term. However, the RSI and Fibonacci retracement levels suggest that there may be some potential for a rebound in the future.

The stock price has been in a downtrend since the beginning of the data set on 2024/07/29. The price has made a number of attempts to rally, but each rally has been met with selling pressure. The stock is currently trading at 804, which is below its 200-day moving average of 828. The 50-day moving average is also trending down, which indicates that the momentum is to the downside. The RSI is also below 50, which indicates that the stock is oversold. The Fibonacci retracement levels show that the stock is currently trading at the 61.8% retracement level. This level is often seen as a support level, but it is important to note that it is not a guarantee that the stock will bounce. Overall, the technical analysis suggests that the stock is in a downtrend and that there is a high risk of further downside. A stop-loss order should be placed below the 61.8% retracement level to protect against further losses.
